content: **knitted socks/ankle socks in 2 strands drops fabel the piece is worked top down in stocking stitch sizes 35 43 ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern fa-527 yarn group a + a or c ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** 35/37 - 38/40 - 41/43 foot-length 22-24-26 cm leg approx 4 cm **yarn** drops fabel from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50-50-50 g colour 100 off white 50-50-50 g colour 161 pink dream **needles** drops double pointed needles size 4 mm **knitting gauge** 19 stitches in width and 25 row in height with stocking stitch and 2 strands = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
